body_content.explanation: to appear on stage after giving a performance to express thanks to the audience, usually by bowing (= bending your head and the top part of your body forwards):
examples: The audience applauded enthusiastically, and she came back on stage to take another bow.
The music ended, and the boy quickly took a bow and disappeared behind the curtains.
